title: REPLACE
description: Returns a new string by replacing all case-sensitive occurrences of a target substring in the original string with a specified replacement.

parameters.name: replacement
parameters.description: The substring to insert in place of the target substring.

examples:
REPLACE(CaseDescription, "urgent", "important")
-- Replaces all occurrences of "urgent" with "important" in the field CaseDescription (case-sensitive).
